thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 12 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Karnataka Bank Dec-Qtr Net Profit Up About 28 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Karnataka Bank Dec-Qtr Net Profit Up About 28 pct
text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Karnataka Bank Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER NET PROFIT 873.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 685.2 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 13.32 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 13.24 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 1.96 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.01 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 3.97 PERCENT VERSUS 4.13 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 2.85 PERCENT VERSUS 3.04 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text: bit.ly/2EzJNu3 Further company coverage:
